categories: PhD Run Ultra Light Low Cut
description: Low cut socks for high-intensity runs. These run-specific socks are made with Indestructawool and Shred Shield technology to go kilometer after kilometer. Ultra light cushion puts barely anything between you and your shoe for better ground feel.Made of soft merino wool, nylon, and elastane.4-degree elite fit system uses 2 types of elastic for stretch, recovery and to keep the sock in place.Indestructawool Technology in high-impact areas for comfort.Mesh ventilation zones provide moisture management.Virtually Seamless™ toe for chafe-free wear.
name: Smartwool PhD Run Ultra Light Low Cut - Unisex
